Description: Fragmnet of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 137 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 143.)
Curator's comments: Name Thersandros. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0138.10
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (252)
